dynamic_line: &you notice a group of crewmen from the 'Firelight' huddled in a corner, trying to enjoy leave in a more "local" establishment.

responses.text: You dont even to be seen close to those dogs.

dynamic_line: &You buy and share a round with the crew, they warm up to you quickly.  You figure that now's the time to get some info out of them, if want to.

responses.text: Any chance you guys are looking for extra hands?
Throw in a word in and there, make it known you are looking for contraband to buy.
